Version 1.5▶️ Multiple accounts▶️ Scrape more than 10k members (only possible with our tool)▶️ Scrape members by activity▶️ Add members to your own group▶️ Rotate the accounts▶️ Delay between adds (Your choice)More coming soon!Tutorial: https://youtu.be/MIge995RqEQTelegram: https://t.me/TGToolsFreeDownload: https://www.mediafire.com/file/hn4dq4irkwt4j03/TG-Tools_v1.5.zip/fileFor any questions, bug-reports or if you feel we should add more features, feel free to contact us on Telegram: https//t.me/SubAdder

comments.author: robelneo
comments.body: After seeing the tutorial and what this tool can do I verified my belief that groups with huge members are not the parameter to consider that the project is legit.I always check the groups I'm in and automatically leave and block those that are not familiar to me if this can intrude on my privacy setting, then we can consider this an abuse of user's privacy to be added without their consent.
